title: Stare into Absence Cocktail
directions: Pour amaro liqueur, lemon juice, simple syrup, and espresso liqueur into a highball glass; fill glass with ice. Swizzle cocktail with a bar spoon and garnish with mint.
ingredients: 1 1/2 fluid ounces amaro liqueur (such as Fernet Branca)
1/2 fluid ounce espresso liqueur (such as Galliano Ristretto)
